comment.author: 61308567@N02
comment._content: Another 'pin-up' shot I would guess a circus belle-dame and this may have been a publicity shot (sort of calamity jane type of thing?)  Does anyone know?  Those are, however, very piercing eyes, imagine she can shoot straight!
